mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.department, u.email, u.mobile, u.state, DATE_FORMAT(last_login_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as last_login_time, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as create_time, DATE_FORMAT(modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as modify_time, r.role_name
from user u
JOIN user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
ORDER BY create_time ASC
